message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'd like to save as much money as possible.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. I'm still looking to save as much as I can.
